original_text: Then Rebekah took the best garments of Esau her older son, which were with her in the house, and put them on Jacob her younger son.
korean_text: 리브가가 집 안 자기에게 있는 그의 맏아들 에서의 좋은 의복을 가져다가 그의 작은 아들 야곱에게 입히고

sentences.original_text: Then Rebekah took the best garments of Esau her older son,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 리브가는 맏아들 에서의 가장 좋은 옷을 가져다가,

sentences.original_text: which were with her in the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 옷들은 그녀와 함께 집에 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and put them on Jacob her younger son.
